heading: HR00914
0: RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST TERMS THE ILLEGAL ARRESTS, DETENTION, AND OTHER VIOLATIONS OF RIGHTS UNDER THE 1987 CONSTITUTION AND LAWS AGAINST SEVERAL TEACHERS AMIDST THE COMMUNITY LOCKDOWNS DURING THE PUBLIC HEALTH EMERGENCY DUE TO COVID-19 AND URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT AN IMMEDIATE INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE SAME
principal-authors: CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; GAITE, FERDINAND R.; CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2020-05-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00914
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST TERMS THE ILLEGAL ARRESTS, DETENTION, AND OTHER VIOLATIONS OF RIGHTS UNDER THE 1987 CONSTITUTION AND LAWS AGAINST SEVERAL TEACHERS AMIDST THE COMMUNITY LOCKDOWNS DURING THE PUBLIC HEALTH EMERGENCY DUE TO COVID-19 AND URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT AN IMMEDIATE INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE SAME
